synopsis.p: Maps elements according to a tab-separated mapping file.

description.p: reads the tab-separated mapping file and maps the elements specified by the expression . The mapping key of the elements is specified by the expression evaluated as a string with the element as the context. The key is mapped agains the column of specified by (starting at 0). Each feature in is set with the value of the corresponding column in the matched line.

param-doc.name: target
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a list of elements with the corpus as context that specify the elements to be mapped.

param-doc.name: targetFeatures
param-doc.p: Name of the features where to store the columns of matched lines.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: form
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the target element as context that specifies the target key.

param-doc.name: ignoreCase
param-doc.p: Either to match ignoring the case.

param-doc.name: keyColumn
param-doc.p: Index of the line key in .

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
